body.name: KOHLER 3814-0 Corbelle Comfort Height(R) elongated 1.28 gpf toilet with skirted trapway and Revolution 360 swirl flushing technology and left-hand trip lever (2 Piece), White

climatePledgeFriendly.details: WaterSense is a voluntary label from the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), which identifies products that meet criteria from the EPA for water-efficiency and performance.

features: Elongated bowl offers added room and comfort
Revolution 360 swirl flushing technology generates a forceful swirling motion to keep the bowl cleaner, longer
Comfort Height feature offers chair-height seating that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults.
Durable canister design has 90% less exposed seal material than a 3" flapper for leak-free performance
body.description: The Corbelle two-piece toilet delivers powerful, clean swirl-style flushing in a sleek skirted design. Kohler's most complete flush ever, Revolution 360 swirl flushing technology keeps your bowl cleaner longer than a conventional flush. Installation is easy with the ReadyLock(TM) system: the skirted trapway installs to the floor flange and attaches to the toilet, eliminating the need to drill holes while offering the same secure installation as non-skirted toilets. This WaterSense(R)-labeled high-efficiency toilet brings you annual water savings.

productInformation.name: Included Components
productInformation.value: ‎Toilet Tank, Toilet Bowl, Trip Lever, Tank Cover and ReadyLock Installation System

productInformation.value: #344,137 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #124 in Two-Piece Toilets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second time is the charmin
reviews.reviewText: Only half of toilet delivered initially but once the full order was delivered it is a very nice toilet. Uses less water than most but because of the whirlpool flushing action it has tremendous power. I’ll definitely get another.I installed it myself. Easy to install and the skirt makes cleanup super easy. The only issue I ran into was that the previous toilet was a standard toilet not a skirted toilet. That meant that I had to move the water supply a couple of inches so it would clear the skirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great service from Kohler
reviews.reviewText: Good toilet. The top part came cracked. Kohler sent a replacement no questions asked. Good job Kohler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars $500 toilet .. without a seat?!
reviews.reviewText: First time this was delivered, the bottom was shattered by the delivery company. Amazon sent a replacement but made me dispose of the broken toilet (cost me $30). Installed this morning. Was fairly straightforward. However i realized there was no seat. After checking the description, it clearly states there isn’t one so that’s on me BUT .. a $500 toilet doesn’t include a seat? Really? All the pictures for the toilet clearly show one installed and I feel it’s a little misleading. All and all, I would not purchase a toilet from Amazon again. Bad experience all around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my bathroom renovation. Love the sleek design and height of it. Flushes very quickly and efficiently. Will buy the same one for my other bathrooms when I remodel them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It flushes quickly!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect height for someone 6’2”. However came with scratches on tank lid. BAD PACKAGING!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kohler toilets are the best.
reviews.reviewText: This was the third Kohler toilet I've purchased and installed in my house. I love the skirted base, soft close lid and overall finish on this commode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks and works great! The price was great....I had bought two but one was broken so it had to be returned. The return went smoothly and I was promptly refunded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toilet ever
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely beautiful and just the right height. We just remodeled our powder room and we were looking and reading reviews on lots of toilets. I wanted something modern but durable as we often have kids together. This fits both needs. We had a contractor install so not sure a out the difficulty. I do know that we had to pay extra because it's not a standard size toilet. Well worth it. I'm getting 2 more for the other bathrooms .
